sentences.chinese: 你读过屠格涅夫的《烟》吗？

sentences.english: Ivan Sergeyevich Turgenev is a world-famous Russian writer.
sentences.chinese: 屠格涅夫是俄国驰誉世界的作家。

sentences.english: Turgenev is a writer full of artistic charm who employs images uniquely.
sentences.chinese: 屠格涅夫是一位极具艺术魅力的作家。

sentences.english: I was reading a book by Turgenieff.
sentences.chinese: 我看的是本屠格涅夫写的书。

sentences.english: Live Mummy is the summation of the philosophical and aesthetic idea of Turgenev.
sentences.chinese: 《活尸》是屠格涅夫哲学美学观念的一个总结。
